vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
εὐθῠ-δρομέω,
of ships, run a straight course, [NT+1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to sail straight, run a straight course
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to sail straight, run a straight course
to run on a straight course; to sail on a direct course, Acts 16:11; 21:1*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 沿著直的路線行, 直行 (徒 16:11, 21:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 沿着直的路线行, 直行 (徒 16:11, 21:1)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đi thẳng đến; đi thuyền thẳng đến; chạy thẳng. εὐθύς (G2117) + δρόμος (G1408)
